availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer and common schools commissioner. Tennessee native. Married to Maria A. O'Donnell on November 8, 1838, in Washington County, Tennessee. Farmer in Laurel County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Jackson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Commissioner of Common Schools in Jackson County in 1862 and 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel County, p. 39A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, McKee, p. 917.
Tennessee State Marriages (1780-2002), Nashville, Tennessee, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Washington County Marriages, Vol. 0, p. 123.
Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863, in 1864 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 10. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), p. 52, 73.
